jobs.title: Frontend Developer Intern
jobs.description: Join our dynamic frontend team and work on cutting-edge web applications. You'll learn React, TypeScript, and modern development practices while contributing to real projects.

jobs.title: Senior Backend Engineer
jobs.description: We're looking for an experienced backend engineer to join our growing team. You'll work with Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies to build scalable microservices.

jobs.title: UX/UI Design Intern
jobs.description: Perfect opportunity for design students to gain real-world experience. Work on user research, wireframing, and creating beautiful interfaces for our clients.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Join our fast-growing startup and help build the next generation of web applications. We use React, Node.js, and AWS to create amazing user experiences.

jobs.title: Data Science Intern
jobs.description: Work with our data science team to analyze large datasets and build machine learning models. Great opportunity to learn Python, R, and data visualization tools.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Help us scale our infrastructure and improve our deployment processes. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS required.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.description: Learn digital marketing strategies and help us grow our client base. You'll work on social media campaigns, content creation, and analytics.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product development from conception to launch. Work with engineering and design teams to create products that users love.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Build native iOS and Android applications using React Native. Join our team of passionate developers creating apps used by millions.

jobs.title: Content Writing Intern
jobs.description: Write engaging content for our blog, social media, and marketing materials. Perfect for English majors or aspiring writers.

applications.name: Ali Ahmad
applications.resume_text: Experienced frontend developer with 2 years of React experience. Passionate about creating beautiful user interfaces and learning new technologies.

applications.name: Sarah Johnson
applications.resume_text: Recent computer science graduate with strong foundation in web development. Completed several personal projects using React and JavaScript.

applications.name: Mike Chen
applications.resume_text: Senior software engineer with 5+ years of backend development experience. Expert in Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies.
